alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:57AM EST until February 18 at 7:33AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Clinch River Near Richlands affecting Tazewell County. For the Clinch River...including Richlands...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River Near Richlands. * WHEN...From this morning this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water begins to flood baseball field near water treatment plant. At 11.0 feet, River begins to affect water treatment plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:46 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 11.0 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage during late afternoon into this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 03/01/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EST.
